channel.title: Upcoming OECD Publication Embargoes and Launches
channel.description: A list of dates and publications

item.title: Working Together: Skills and Labour Market Integration of Immigrants and their Children in Finland
item.description: Working Together: Skills and Labour Market Integration of Immigrants and their Children in Finland by Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs has an embargo on Wednesday, 5 September 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
item.oe:directorate: Directorate for Employment, Labour and Social Affairs

item.title: Simplified registration and collection mechanisms for taxpayers that are not located in the jurisdiction of taxation - A review and assessment
item.description: Simplified registration and collection mechanisms for taxpayers that are not located in the jurisdiction of taxation - A review and assessment by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Thursday, 6 September 2018, 2:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
item.oe:directorate: Centre for Tax Policy and Administration

item.title: Bildung auf einen Blick 2018 - OECD-Indikatoren
item.description: Bildung auf einen Blick 2018 - OECD-Indikatoren by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday, 11 September 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.title: Education at a Glance 2018 - OECD Indicators
item.description: Education at a Glance 2018 - OECD Indicators by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday, 11 September 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.title: Regard sur l'éducation 2018 - Les indicateurs de l'OCDE
item.description: Regard sur l'éducation 2018 - Les indicateurs de l'OCDE by Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Tuesday, 11 September 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.title: Examens de l'OCDE sur la coopération pour le développement : Canada 2018
item.description: Examens de l'OCDE sur la coopération pour le développement : Canada 2018 by Development Co-operation Directorate has an embargo on Friday, 14 September 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.title: OECD Development Co-operation Peer Reviews: Canada 2018
item.description: OECD Development Co-operation Peer Reviews: Canada 2018 by Development Co-operation Directorate has an embargo on Friday, 14 September 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.title: Effective Carbon Rates 2018 - Pricing Carbon Emissions Through Taxes and Emissions Trading
item.description: Effective Carbon Rates 2018 - Pricing Carbon Emissions Through Taxes and Emissions Trading by Centre for Tax Policy and Administration has an embargo on Tuesday, 18 September 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.title: Examen multidimensionnel du Sénégal - Volume 3. De l'analyse à l'action
item.description: Examen multidimensionnel du Sénégal - Volume 3. De l'analyse à l'action by Public Affairs and Communications Directorate, Development Centre has an embargo on Tuesday, 18 September 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).

item.title: Supporting Entrepreneurship and Innovation in Higher Education in The Netherlands
item.description: Supporting Entrepreneurship and Innovation in Higher Education in The Netherlands by Centre for Entrepreneurship, SMEs and Local Development, Directorate for Education and Skills has an embargo on Sunday, 30 September 2018, 11:00 Paris time (GMT+02:00).
